metadata.name: 3D Room #1
metadata.description:
The 3D Doodle Rooms were curated from scratch by the Doodle Rooms team, without using any computer generated tools. 
Holding a 3D Doodle Room , will grant you access to the Doodle Estate ecosystem, the Doodle Towers, public spaces, and you will be able to enjoy all the utilities, and benefits that comes with it. 

1) get access to the Doodle Tower and the entire doodle estate on Decentraland. We own 10 plots on Decentraland. We are also building our own Metaverse on Unreal Engine in parallel.

2) earn $room token by staking your rooms . In March 2023 we will embark on listing this token on DEX 

3) turn your room into a business hub by connecting your website or affiliate links to earn commissions in FIAT. Imagine when someone enters your room and interacts with your elements, it would take them to your affiliate linked website where you have potential to earn. Now imagine having 5 or 10 different stores like this in Metaverse. 

4) explore your room, invite friends to watch a movie, host an event in our Exhibition Centre, participate in Health Centre seminars on VR. 

5) fully customize and upgrade your rooms by purchasing assets from Doodle Marketplace 

6) display your favorite NFTs on your NFT frame in your room walls or galleries by connecting your wallet. 

Please read our whitepaper for more details.

Doodle Rooms 2D Genesis - https://opensea.io/collection/doodlerooms
Doodle Sanctuary Pets - https://opensea.io/collection/doodlesanctuarypets
